code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={id:0};var selectedIdSlice=createSlice({name:"selectedId",initialState:initialState,reducers:{resetId:function resetId(state){return initialState;},setId:function setId(state,action){state.id=action.payload;}}});var _selectedIdSlice$acti=selectedIdSlice.actions,resetId=_selectedIdSlice$acti.resetId,setId=_selectedIdSlice$acti.setId;export{resetId,setId};export var newSelectedId=function newSelectedId(state){return state.selectedId.id;};export var selectedIdReducer=selectedIdSlice.reducer;
